Package it.univpm.ProgettoOOP.Controller

Class Roots

java.lang.Object
it.univpm.ProgettoOOP.Controller.Roots
@RestController
public class Roots
extends java.lang.Object

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Roots()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.lang.String differenceSpeed()
    This root provides the user to see the differences between the speed of the wind datas assimilated through the days.
    Place filteredDay​(java.lang.String date)
    This is a root in which the user can choose the weather during the day he provides in the @method filterPerDay written inside @class MyFilter.
    Place filteredHour​(java.lang.String time)
    This is a root in which the user can choose the weather during the time he provides in the @method filterPerHour written inside @class MyFilter.
    org.json.simple.JSONObject getCurrentWeather​(java.lang.String city)
    This is a root that has as @return the informations of the current time taken by the API.
    org.json.simple.JSONObject getWeather5Days​(java.lang.String city)
    This is a root that has as @return the informations of the forecast for the next 5 days taken by the API.
    Place seeApiCalls()  
    Place seeApiForecast()  
    java.lang.String seeStatistics​(java.lang.String date)
    This root provides the user to see statistics calculated with @file ApiCallsByTime , so using the datas coming from current Weather API.
    java.lang.String writer​(java.lang.String city)
    This is a root used to call the Weather API and write automatically every hour the informations inside @ApiCallsByTime(local file situated in the resources).
    java.lang.String writerForecast​(java.lang.String city)
    This is a root used to call the Forecast API and write automatically the informations inside @ApiForecast(local file situated in the resources).

    • Roots

      public Roots()

  • Method Details

    • getCurrentWeather

      @RequestMapping({"/get/current/{city}","/get/current/"}) public org.json.simple.JSONObject getCurrentWeather​(@PathVariable(value="city",required=false) java.lang.String city)
      This is a root that has as @return the informations of the current time taken by the API.
      Parameters:
      city - is the city we want to study.

    • getWeather5Days

      @RequestMapping({"/get/forecast/{city}","/get/forecast/"}) public org.json.simple.JSONObject getWeather5Days​(@PathVariable(value="city",required=false) java.lang.String city)
      This is a root that has as @return the informations of the forecast for the next 5 days taken by the API.
      Parameters:
      city - is the city we want to study.

    • writer

      @RequestMapping({"/writer/3/hours/{city}","/writer/3/hours/"}) public java.lang.String writer​(@PathVariable(value="city",required=false) java.lang.String city) throws WrongFileException
      This is a root used to call the Weather API and write automatically every hour the informations inside @ApiCallsByTime(local file situated in the resources). The @return is "Carimento Completato" if everything works properly. If the root has a problem while searching for the file it gives "The file given doesn't exist" as @return
      Throws:
      WrongFileException

    • writerForecast

      @RequestMapping({"/writer/forecast/{city}","/writer/forecast/"}) public java.lang.String writerForecast​(@PathVariable(value="city",required=false) java.lang.String city) throws WrongFileException
      This is a root used to call the Forecast API and write automatically the informations inside @ApiForecast(local file situated in the resources). The @return is "Carimento Completato" if everything works properly. If the root has a problem while searching for the file it gives "The file given doesn't exist" as @return
      Throws:
      WrongFileException

    • filteredHour

      @RequestMapping({"/filter/per/hour/{time}","/filter/per/hour/"}) public Place filteredHour​(@PathVariable(value="time",required=false) java.lang.String time) throws HourGivenNotFound
      This is a root in which the user can choose the weather during the time he provides in the @method filterPerHour written inside @class MyFilter.
      Parameters:
      hour - should be written in this manner : "hour:minutes,AM/PM" (AM or PM) Example : 10:00,PM
      Returns:
      Throws:
      HourGivenNotFound

    • filteredDay

      @RequestMapping({"/filter/per/day/{date}","/filter/per/day/"}) public Place filteredDay​(@PathVariable(value="date",required=false) java.lang.String date) throws DayGivenNotFound
      This is a root in which the user can choose the weather during the day he provides in the @method filterPerDay written inside @class MyFilter.
      Parameters:
      date - should be written in this manner : "day_of_the_week,month day_of_the_month,year" Example : Saturday,January 1,2022
      Returns:
      Throws:
      DayGivenNotFound

    • differenceSpeed

      @RequestMapping("/difference/speed/") public java.lang.String differenceSpeed()
      This root provides the user to see the differences between the speed of the wind datas assimilated through the days.
      Returns:
      a String containing those differences indicating the exact time and date of the the result.

    • seeStatistics

      @RequestMapping({"/see/statistics/{date}","/see/statistics/"}) public java.lang.String seeStatistics​(@PathVariable(value="date",required=false) java.lang.String date) throws DayGivenNotFound
      This root provides the user to see statistics calculated with @file ApiCallsByTime , so using the datas coming from current Weather API.
      Returns:
      a String containing those statistics.
      Throws:
      DayGivenNotFound

    • seeApiCalls

      @GetMapping("/see/ApiCallsByTime") public Place seeApiCalls()

    • seeApiForecast

      @GetMapping("/see/ApiForecast") public Place seeApiForecast()
